featured.text: Now it is healing and prospering and greets visitors with open arms. 26.
Most styes heal on their own within a few days.
Scientists thus hope that understanding the self-healing mystery of the fish may one day allow humans to regenerate such organs as eyes, hearts, and spines.
Sometimes this may be as simple as touching the holy man and being immediately healed.

other.text: Many women report that the henna crowns really work as a healing device, helping them build a more 20 self-image at a time when they are vulnerable and depressed.
Above all, they possess some amazing “self-healing” power.

definition.zh_def: 治癒，恢復健康或正常狀態。
definition.en_def: To make someone or something healthy again; to restore to a normal condition.
definition.example: The doctor was able to heal the patient's wounds quickly.
